nodes.text: Stenness lizard pie was a foodstuff that was available for consumption in the Stenness Hyperspace Terminal. While briefly visiting the spaceport, protocol droid A-3DO was sent to purchase food for his master, Jedi Knight Andur Sunrider, and his family. Threedee returned with refreshments, which Sunrider hoped did not include Stenness lizard pie, as he suspected that his daughter Vima would find it unsavory.
